purpose: Facilitates task-parallel programming with visualization and profiling capabilities
principle: Builds on Go's concurrency model to create a framework for defining and executing tasks in parallel, with tools for visualizing task dependencies and profiling execution
reusability: Designed as a Go library with APIs for task management and execution, allowing integration into Go applications
limitations: Primarily focused on Go language, may not support complex workflows beyond task parallelism, limited documentation
name: go-taskflow
description: A pure go General-purpose Task-parallel Programming Framework with integrated visualizer and profiler
highlight: Integrated visualizer and profiler for task-parallel programming in Go
